name: 8-bit sunset - reprocess I
description:
Original "8-bit sunset" reprocessed using export to raw data audio waveform -> audio echo processing -> raw conversion back to image state.

8-bit sunset conjured with a Fairlight CVI (Computer Video Instrument) (1983) and a panasonic video mixer.  
 
2933x2208 pixel 
300 dpi 
original 2017, reprocess 2021
